[Page Title: Poogan's Smokehouse | Southern BBQ Restaurant in Charleston | South Carolina]

top of page 188 East Bay Street, Charleston, SC 29401  |  Open Sunday - Thursday from 11am - 9pm & Friday - Saturday from 11am - 10pm View Menus Charleston’s French Quarter has its share of legends, and Poogan’s Smokehouse is proud to be part of the story. We share our roots with Poogan’s Porch, a beloved Charleston landmark that first opened in 1976, where a stray dog named Poogan greeted guests at the door and stories of friendly spirits became part of the charm. At Poogan’s Smokehouse, we kept the hospitality, traded the haunted history for some hearty smoke, and built a menu around slow-smoked barbecue, satisfying Southern sides, and our house-famous ribs. ​ Since opening in 2015, we've also earned a reputation for our extensive bourbon and whiskey list, complete with curated flights perfect for sipping and savoring. Whether you're craving a plate piled high with barbecue or a drink worth lingering over, Poogan’s Smokehouse is where good food and great company come together. Lunch & Dinner Sunday - Thursday 11am - 9pm ​ Friday - Saturday 11am - 10pm 843-577-5665 188 East Bay Street, Charleston, SC 29401 Reserve a Table MAKE THEIR DAY. A Poogan’s Hospitality gift card is the perfect way to treat someone special to a warm welcome and an unforgettable dining experience. ​ Choose the amount that fits the occasion, whether it’s a casual bite or a full Southern feast. Available for purchase in person or delivered instantly via email or text, our gift cards make last-minute gifting effortless. You can even schedule a digital delivery for a future date or time. And with no expiration date, they can savor their meal whenever the moment feels just right. Purchase a Gift Card LOVE LETTERS TO OUR BBQ - STUART R. My wife and I have been big fans of Poogan’s Porch for years, so we decided to give Poogan’s Smokehouse a try for lunch today. Let me tell you, we were not disappointed. When we asked our waitress for a recommendation, she suggested the Four Porksmen sandwich, saying it was a crowd favorite. Folks, I’ve eaten a lot of sandwiches in my 60 years, but I’ve never seen anything like this one. It was absolutely incredible with a rib sitting on top of the bun. The flavors were great and our waitress was delightful —cracking jokes, sharing her favorites, and really making us feel at home. This was the kind of meal that turns you into a lifelong fan. - STACIE W. I got the Smokehouse Salad with smoked turkey, which was juicy and flavorful. My party also got a serving of smoked turkey with sides that were substantial; the smoked turkey sandwich was absolutely phenomenal with the pimento cheese and beautifully toasted bun; and the pulled pork tacos, which were displayed well and stuffed substantially. We also tried two zero-proof mocktails—highly recommend the Sweet Sereni-Tea and the "Nojito." Fresh and beautiful presentation. Our server, Meghan, was attentive and pleasant throughout the entire meal. They were also accommodating and attentive toward my dietary restriction of gluten. 10/10. YOUR TURN TO DISH Tell us about your visit, and you just might see your words featured here. Leave a Review bottom of page

top of page BBQ MADE FOR BIG MOMENTS. When it comes to planning an event, we know you've got a lot on your plate. Wouldn't it be better if that plate was filled with Southern BBQ instead? Consider it done! Our loft is ideal for rehearsal dinners, corporate functions, family reunions, birthdays, and more. View Our Event Guide Click to take a virtual tour of our event space SELECT THE OPTION THAT SUITS YOUR PARTY PREFERENCES. Booking your event is easy with our DirectBook system. Pick your date, time, and menu, then place a $100 deposit to lock it in. The deposit is applied to your final balance, and only charged once your event is approved. It's also refundable with at least 48 hours’ notice. Best part? No room or rental fees! FAQs
Promotions and Discounts Private Events Reservations Gift Cards Dining with Us Holidays 
Do you offer discounts to active duty military, veterans, or first responders?
It’s our honor to serve those who serve. We proudly offer a 15% discount on food for veterans, active-duty military, police, and firefighters. Just show your server or bartender a valid form of ID, and we’ll take care of the rest. 
Do you have a loyalty program?
We sure do, and it’s packed with perks: ➤ Earn 1 point for every dollar you spend, plus 25 bonus points just for signing up. ➤ Rack up 100 points and we’ll throw you a bone—enjoy a $10 reward on us. ➤ Every dog has its day! Celebrate your birthday with a $5 reward when you dine with us within 5 days of your big day. ➤ Points can be earned and redeemed at all five Poogan’s Hospitality locations. Sign up once, enjoy the rewards everywhere. It’s our way of saying thanks for being part of the pack. 
Do you donate gift cards to charitable organizations?
Our "Community Outreach" committee is dedicated to reviewing gift card donation requests on an ongoing basis. To be considered, complete the form at the link below at least three weeks prior to your event donation deadline. To ensure fairness and consistency, we accept all submissions through the link below and are unable to accept requests by phone, email, or in-person visits. If you are selected, you will be notified. We appreciate your kindness and commitment to improving the lives of those in our community. 
Donation Requests
TAKE A VIRTUAL TOUR OF OUR EVENT SPACE. Haven’t been by in a while? Or planning from afar? Our virtual tour lets you step inside and explore our private event space at your own pace. Whether you're envisioning an intimate dinner or a lively celebration, this is your chance to see how it all comes to life – no visit required (but we’d love to see you soon). bottom of page

We don’t believe in rushing good things, and we know the best meals start low and slow. Our menu’s built on Southern traditions you can taste and twists that keep things interesting, all paired with a whiskey list that also knows a thing or two about patience.
